property.name: Text
property.value: Non-unique character only. Take control of attached character and all attachments on that character. Attached character may not attack or defend unless you control another character from the same house.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Stark] character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. Response: discard Resilience from play to save attached character from being killed or discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after a Stark character is killed, put Jory into play from your hand or discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: save another Maester character from being killed or discarded, then return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: change Roose Bolton's House affiliation until the end of the phase (limit once per phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: Ser Rodrick Cassel does not kneel to defend. Ser Rodrick Cassel gets +2 STR while defending.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: change Dreadfort Guard's House affiliation until the end of the phase (limit once per phase).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: discard the top card of your deck to change Flayed Men's House affiliation until the end of the phase (limit once per phase).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Winterfell Recruit gets +1 STR while attacking. Response: after you win a [Military] challenge by 4 or more total STR, return Winterfell Recruit from your discard pile or dead pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Winterfell Cavalry does not kneel to attack an opponent who controls more characters than you.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you play a character with printed STR 3 or higher from your hand, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel to choose and stand a defending character. That character gets +2 STR for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to search your deck for an Item or Weapon card, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character loses a [Military] icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Lannister] character only. Attached character does not kneel to attack or defend during [Intrigue] challenges. Response: after you win an [Intrigue] challenge by 4 or more total STR, return King's Spider from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a challenge in which Grand Maester Pycelle participates, draw a card for each card discarded from the losing opponent's hand during that challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Jhalabhar Xho gains stealth while you control fewer characters than any opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Kingsguard characters gain +1 STR while defending.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after a character is killed, stand Ser Gregor Clegane.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel and discard the top 2 cards of your deck to chose a [Lannister] character. That character gains or loses the [Stealth] keyword.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Circle of Spies from your hand, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kneel to choose and kneel a character with STR 2 or lower.

property.value: King's Landing,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel to choose a non-Army attacking character without an INT icon. Stand that character and remove it from the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you reveal a plot card, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of those cards on top of your deck, the other on the bottom.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win an [Intrigue] challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose and kneel a character with STR 3 or lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Baratheon] character only. Attached character may not be chosen as the only target of an event card or character ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +1 STR and the Knight trait. If attached character is Ser Davos Seaworth, he gains Renown and, 'Response: after Ser Davos Seaworth is saved, draw 2 cards.'.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ser Cortnay Penrose gets +2 STR while participating in a [Power] challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: discard the top 2 cards of your deck to choose a character in any dead pile. Move that character to its owner's discard pile (limit once per round).

property.name: Text
property.value: After Field Sergeant is played or is put into play, put the top 2 cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck, in any order. After Field Sergeant is put into your discard pile or your dead pile, put the top 2 [non-Field Sergeant] cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck, in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: An opponent who controls more characters than you may not choose House Florent Rearguard as the only target of an event card or character ability.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a [Power] challenge by 4 or more total STR, return Lost Captain from your discard pile or dead pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to claim 1 power for your House. Use this ability only if you control fewer characters than any opponent. Limit once per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kneel to choose a kneeling character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -1 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time an opponent reveals a plot card that is in your used pile, cancel all effects of the plot card. Your opponent must then reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a [Power] challenge by 4 or more total STR, kneel to choose and stand a [Baratheon] character. That character claims 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you reveal a plot card, move any number of power from one character you control to another.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to reveal the top card of your deck to all players. If that card is a [Baratheon] character, put it into play. Otherwise, discard it.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Greyjoy] character only. Attached character gains stealth. Response: after you win an unopposed challenge, stand attached character.

property.name: Text
property.value: While attached character is attacking or defending against an opponent who controls more locations than you, attached character gains +2 STR and renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: during a [Military] challenge, kneel to have Andrik the Unsmiling participate in the challenge as an attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Balon Greyjoy is attacking, characters with lower STR than his may not be declared as defenders.

property.name: Text
property.value: When The Reader is placed in your dead pile, draw 2 cards.

property.value: Response: save House Harlaw Pikeman from being killed or discarded, then return it to owner's hand.

property.value: [Targaryen] character only. Attached character gets +1 STR. If attached character is Daenerys Targaryen, instead she gets +2 STR and gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dothraki character only. Limit 1 per character. Challenges: during a [Military] challenge in which attached character participates, kneel Arakh to give another participating character -2 STR for the duration of the challenge (if that character's STR is 0, it is killed).

property.value: [Targaryen] character only. Attached character gets +4 STR while attacking.

property.value: After you play Drogon from your hand, kneel all non-Dragon characters in play.

property.value: Response: after an opponent chooses Rhaegal as a target of an event or character ability, kill all of his or her characters.

property.value: Attach to your House House card. Limit 1 per House card. You need 2 fewer power in order to win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Any phase: discard the top card of your deck to change attached character's House affiliation (limit once per phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: during a [Military] or [Power] challenge, kneel to choose a participating character without attachments. For the duration of the challenge, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a [Power] challenge by 4 or more total STR, put Beric Dondarrion from your dead pile into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Littlefinger does not kneel to attack. Response: kneel to cancel the effects of an event card just played.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a [Military] challenge by 4 or more total STR as the attacker, kneel to choose and kneel a character without attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a character to gain a [Military] icon and stealth until the end of the phase (limit once per phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: if Mad Huntsman is participating in a challenge, stand him and one other participating character without attachments. Remove both characters from the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kneel to choose a character without attachments. Treat that character as though its text box were blank until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: choose and kneel or stand another Maester character (limit once per phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to choose a character. Return all attachments on that character to their owners' hands.

property.value: Ally,Free Cities,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after an event card is played, kneel to kill all characters that were knelt to pay any costs of the event.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: kneel to save a character from being killed or discarded. Use this ability only if you control fewer characters than any opponent.

property.value: Mountain Skirmisher gets +2 STR while you control fewer characters than any opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kneel to stand a Knight character.

property.value: Lower the cost for you to play locations by 1 while you control fewer locations than any opponent.

property.value: King's Landing,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Street of Silk, discard one of your locations from play (cannot be saved). Marshalling: kneel to lower the cost of the next unique character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: put the top 3 cards of any player's discard pile on the bottom of his or her deck in any order. Response: after you win a challenge by 4 or more total STR, return Constant Rebuilding from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: cancel the effects of an event, location or character ability with the word 'plot' in its text, then claim 1 power for your House.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: choose a Dragon character to gain stealth until the end of the phase. Response: after you win a challenge by 4 or more total STR, return Dragon Flight from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel one of your [Lannister] characters to choose and kneel a non-Army character without an [Intrigue] icon. Limit 1 per phase. Response: after you win an [Intrigue] challenge by 4 or more total STR, return Endless Bureaucracy from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose one of your participating [Stark] characters to get +2 STR for the duration of the challenge. Limit 1 per phase. Response: after you win a [Military] challenge by 4 or more total STR, return Endless Endurance from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel one of your [Greyjoy] characters to choose and discard from play a location with printed cost 2 or lower. Limit 1 per phase. Response: after you win a challenge by 4 or more total STR, return Endless Raid from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose and stand a [Baratheon] character with STR 3 or lower. Response: after you win a [Power] challenge by 4 or more total STR, return Endless Vigil from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: choose and return a unique [Targaryen] character from your dead pile to your hand. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: search your deck for a copy of a unique [Greyjoy] character you control, reveal it to all players, and attach it to the original. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kneel one of your [Lannister] characters to choose a non-[Lannister] character. Add or remove an [Intrigue] icon from that character until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kneel one of your [Targaryen] characters to choose a character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if ist STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: during a [Military] challenge, kneel 2 of your [Stark] characters to kill all attacking characters. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel 2 of your [Greyjoy] to choose an opponent. That opponent must discard all power on his or her characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: play after a [Targaryen] character has been killed. Draw 2 cards, then draw an additional card for each attachment on that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: kneel 2 of your characters to cancel the effects of an event card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose one of your participating [Stark] characters and another participating character. Stand both characters and remove them from the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel one of your Maester characters to choose and put into play a character from your discard pile. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: save one of your unique characters from being killed. Then return that character to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel 2 of your [Baratheon] characters to have all characters with STR 3 or higher claim 1 power. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel one of your [Greyjoy] characters to put into play a Warship location from your discard pile. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel a Maester character you control to discard your hand. Then put into your hand from the top of your deck a number of cards equal to the number of cards discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose up to two participating [Baratheon] characters to get +1 STR each for the duration of the challenge. If you win the challenge, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after a player reveals a plot card, kneel one of your [Baratheon] locations to choose and reveal a plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose one of your defending [Stark] characters to gain renown for the duration of the challenge. If you win the challenge, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: each opponent who controls more characters than you must lose a power from his or her House and choose to discard a card from his or her hand. Draw a card for each power lost and each card discarded in this way. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel one of your [Lannister] characters to look at the top X cards of a player's deck, discard one of your choice, and return the rest to the top of their owner's deck in any order. X is the STR of the character knelt.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: when a non-plot card is played, kneel 2 of your [Lannister] characters to cancel its effects. Then discard that card from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel 2 of your [Targaryen] characters to return all attachment cards from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a participating [Targaryen] character. That character gets +4 STR for the duration of the challenge. Discard the character from play after the challenge resolves.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel X of your [Targaryen] characters to choose X characters without attachments. Until the end of the phase, each chosen character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0. Limit 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters and locations cannot be saved.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per plot deck. In order to play an event card, a player must give an opponent one power from his or her House.

property.name: Text
property.value: You cannot initiate more than one challenge this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each character you control is considered to be of your House in addition to any other House affiliation it may have. When playing an Alliance House card, characters are considered to be of both Houses, in addition to their original House Affiliation.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Maester character gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, cancel the effects of each opponent's revealed plot card. Each opponent must then reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, put the top card of your discard pile on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: No more than one character may be declared as an attacker or defender during challenges.
